programme.title: Darbar
programme.desc: A police officer goes on a chase to hunt down a long-dreaded gangster for fulfilling his own secret agenda.

programme.title: 1971: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: After saving a Pakistani commander's life during a UN mission, Colonel Mahadevan reveals that his father Brigadier Sahadevan had killed the commander's father during the 1971 India-Pakistan War.

programme.title: The Front Row with Anupama Chopra
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Bal Ganesh 3
programme.desc: A group of alien kids visit Earth to learn more about their favourite god, Bal Ganesh. They meet three mice, Dhoti, Topi and Suit Boot, who are ardent devotees ready to share his adventurous tales.

programme.title: Gharwali Baharwali
programme.desc: A man finds out his wife is cheating on him so he decides to re-marry and keep a second wife who will fulfil his long-term ambitions of becoming a father.

programme.title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
programme.desc: A young man and his beloved hatch a plan to win the approval of her three eccentric uncles.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Khiladi
programme.desc: A slacker must impress a wealthy man to marry his daughter.

programme.title: Tennis Buddies
programme.desc: A young tennis player gets trained by her father who used to play the game too. Problems arise when they do not agree with each other's ideologies of playing single as against playing as a team.

programme.title: Khatta Meetha
programme.desc: A seemingly corrupt petty contractor faces challenges from the local municipality, his family, his employees, as well as a former girlfriend and her family.

programme.title: Neerja
programme.desc: The story of the courageous Neerja Bhanot, who sacrificed her life while protecting the lives of 359 passengers on a flight in 1986. The flight was hijacked by a terrorist organisation.

programme.title: Kaala Karikalan
programme.desc: A resident of Dharavi unites the people living in his area to stand up against a ruthless politician who dreams of taking over their land.

programme.title: 2001: Do Hazaar Ek
programme.desc: Two police officers investigate a serial killer, until one becomes a suspect.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: When Bollywood guests make themselves comfortable on Karan Johar's couch, what brews between them is not 'Koffee' but a no-holds-barred conversation. Apart from the juiciest gossip and candid stories, a lot more comes out from under their hats.

programme.title: Ghar Dwaar
programme.desc: Chanda and her mother face humiliation at the hands of Dhanraj and his family. Chanda swears to avenge this by destroying the love that binds this family.

programme.title: Door Ki Awaaz
programme.desc: Prakash lives in Chandan Nagar along with his sister Mala his and widowed mom. During a train ride, Mala has an accident and is brought to hospital.

programme.title: Aulad
programme.desc: Believing his wife to be dead, a man lets a woman nurse and bring up his infant son, until he finds out that his wife is still alive, and wants the baby back.

programme.title: Dhruva
programme.desc: A committed police officer is on a very dangerous mission to destroy the most corrupt person in the country, Siddharth Abhimanyu.

programme.title: Baadshaho
programme.desc: An Indian queen asks her bodyguard to steal back gold taken from her by the Indian government during the emergency period in 1975.

programme.title: Ragini MMS
programme.desc: A young couple spends a romantic weekend in a house rigged with hidden cameras that record every moment of their time there.

programme.title: Mantra
programme.desc: Kapil Kapoor, a businessman, goes through many challenges and unexpected changes when the Indian government enters globalization in an attempt to emerge as a global economic superpower.

programme.title: 23rd March 1931: Shaheed
programme.desc: A freedom fighter is arrested for killing the British official responsible for the death of his mentor. He is ultimately hanged for his misdeed.

programme.title: Bioscopewala
programme.desc: While investigating her father's death in a plane crash during his travel to Afghanistan, Minnie comes across Rehmat Khan, a man who used to entertain her with his bioscope show when she was a child.

programme.title: Haqeeqat
programme.desc: Gang leaders raise Shiva after his parents throw him into a gutter when he is a child.

programme.title: Express Khiladi
programme.desc: A cafeteria worker, a young woman and a group of kidnappers meet aboard a train. While romance blossoms between two of the passengers, control of the train begins to be lost.

programme.title: Aanchal
programme.desc: Revolving around the lives of two brothers, Kishan and Shambhur, and the turmoil of their marital relationships.

programme.title: Patiala House
programme.desc: A second-generation Sikh in London gives up his dream to save his father's reputation, until he meets a girl who gives him the strength to stand up for what he believes.

programme.title: Highway
programme.desc: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

programme.title: Bodyguard
programme.desc: Lovely Singh is extremely respectful of Mr Rana and his daughter, Divya. While appointed as her bodyguard, he falls in love with a girl called Chhaya, unaware that she is none other than Divya.

programme.title: Action Jackson
programme.desc: Vishi, a small-time crook, looks like AJ, a professional assassin. AJ convinces Vishi to help him fool the mob so he can be with his wife while she has a baby, and as the crooks close in on Vishi, AJ arrives to deal with them.

programme.title: 7 1/2 Phere: More Than a Wedding
programme.desc: Juhi Chawla plays a first time director, Asmi, who has been given the task to cover a reality show on the marriage of a family. The funny Saade Saat Phere stars Irfan Khan also.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: When Bollywood guests make themselves comfortable on Karan Johar's couch, what brews between them is not 'Koffee' but a no-holds-barred conversation. Apart from the juiciest gossip and candid stories, a lot more comes out from under their hats.

programme.title: Ghar Parivaar
programme.desc: A story of three brothers and their lives, loves and relationships.

programme.title: Ekkees Toppon Ki Salaami
programme.desc: Purushotam Joshi is a common man who fails to earn appreciation despite being an honest government employee. His sons however want to fulfil their father's last wish. But will they succeed?

programme.title: Shaadi No. 1
programme.desc: Kothari has three daughters who shun the idea of arranged marriages. To make them realize, he wants three men to woo the ladies, and then ditch them.

programme.title: Sholay
programme.desc: The tale of one man's fight for justice. In an act of retribution, cold-blooded criminal Gabbar Singh massacres the family of a police officer, Thakur Baldev. Left crippled by his enemy, Thakur is hungry for revenge but, seeing no way of bringing Gabbar to book, he hires two petty crooks, Veeru and Jai.

programme.title: Bala
programme.desc: A prematurely balding man attempts to cope with his situation.

programme.title: Nautanki Saala!
programme.desc: Ram, a successful theatre artist, saves Mandar from committing suicide. He then ends up developing a special bond with Mandar and even helps solve his problems.

programme.title: Begum Jaan
programme.desc: When brothel madam Begum Jaan's home is divided along the Radcliffe Line during the Pakistan-India partition, she and her prostitutes refuse to leave. The madam fights to save her declining business during the chaotic political circumstances.

programme.title: Aashiqui
programme.desc: Rahul is angry with his dad for marrying a second time. Anu runs away from an oppressive girls' hostel. They meet for the first time at a police station and fall in love.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Brothers Sameer and Sagar are forced to search for a sunken treasure after a criminal kidnaps Sagar's girlfriend. With three men after the lost treasure, only one can take it all.

programme.title: The Front Row with Anupama Chopra
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Garam Masala
programme.desc: A skirt-chasing photographer constructs an elaborate pretence to three-time three unsuspecting airhostesses. But when his kindred spirit tries to get in on it, everything is thrown into a wild disarray.

programme.title: Ferrari Ki Sawaari
programme.desc: How the pursuit of an Indian cricket legend's Ferrari makes a young boy's dreams of playing cricket at Lords a reality.

programme.title: Dillagi
programme.desc: Ranvir and Rajvir along with their parents move to Mumbai. They endure numerous hardships, but their will to survive prevails and they succeed.

programme.title: Ribbon
programme.desc: Following a married couple and the challenges they face when they have to deal with unplanned parenthood.

programme.title: Badhaai Ho
programme.desc: A 25-year-old man tries to suppress his embarrassment when his mother announces that she is pregnant.

programme.title: Subedar Joginder Singh
programme.desc: It is a biographical feature film on India's Highest Wartime Gallantry Award - Param Vir Chakra winner Subedar Joginder Singh. He fought three wars for India before achieving martyrdom in the Sino-Indian War of 1962.

programme.title: Hawaizaada
programme.desc: In 1895, Shivkar Bapuji Talpade constructs and flies India's first unmanned plane, despite having the odds stacked against him.

programme.title: Sardaar Ji
programme.desc: Jaggi Singh, the professional ghostbuster from rural Punjab is invited to driving away a ghost in London. Hilarious situations ensue when he falls in love with the ghost.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: When Bollywood guests make themselves comfortable on Karan Johar's couch, what brews between them is not 'Koffee' but a no-holds-barred conversation. Apart from the juiciest gossip and candid stories, a lot more comes out from under their hats.

programme.title: Tu Hai Mera Sunday
programme.desc: Five friends search for their own place to play football in Mumbai.

programme.title: Taarzan: The Wonder Car
programme.desc: Deven tries to sell the design of a futuristic car to Four Fox, who steals his design and kills him. Twelve years later his son rebuilds the car, which avenges his death.

programme.title: Chori Chori Chupke Chupke
programme.desc: After his wife becomes infertile, a tycoon's son hires a prostitute to bear his child.

programme.title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
programme.desc: A young mute girl from Pakistan loses herself in India with no way to head back. A devoted man with a magnanimous spirit undertakes the task to get her back to her motherland and unite her with her family.

programme.title: Golmaal 3
programme.desc: While in Goa, a man meets his love after many years. As they are still not married, someone decides to throw a wedding for them.

programme.title: Singham
programme.desc: After taking charge as the DSP of Singham Khurd, Dilsher Sikhon sets out to end the drug addiction among the youth of Punjab. This sets him against Bhuller, a vicious business tycoon with connections in high places.

programme.title: Kaala Karikalan
programme.desc: A resident of Dharavi unites the people living in his area to stand up against a ruthless politician who dreams of taking over their land.

programme.title: Blackmail
programme.desc: Kalash, the manager of a power plant, romances Asha, the daughter of a wealthy businessman, while Kalash's uncle develops a new solar-powered formula to save energy which makes him and Kalash very wealthy people. Meanwhile, Asha's jealous fiancé Jeevan plots for her to marry Kalash so Jeevan's boss, Asha's father, will gain an inheritance from Kalash's newfound wealth.

programme.title: The Front Row with Anupama Chopra
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Vaada
programme.desc: An obsessive man threatens the love between a newlywed and her blind husband. A blind husband, an obsessed lover and the missing body of a murdered wife.

programme.title: Sau Din Saas Ke
programme.desc: Based on the tyrany of a mother-in-law with her sons and daughters-in-law, the film tells the story of how she mends her ways.

programme.title: Shaan
programme.desc: Hardworking Police Officer Shiv Kumar lives with his wife, his son, and two wayward brothers. When he is killed, Ravi and Vijay renounce their waywardness to find their brother's killer, to avenge his death.

programme.title: Pyar To Hona Hi Tha
programme.desc: Jaiprakash disguises himself as a middle aged nanny to be near his daughter and his ex-wife, Janki. Janki's father even finds himself falling in love.

programme.title: Guest iin London
programme.desc: A young couple in London struggle to live with their estranged aunt and uncle who turn up at their house uninvited.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: An Indian soldier is assigned to eliminate his former mentor and he must keep his wits about him if he is to be successful in his mission. When the two men collide, it results in a barrage of battles and bullets.

programme.title: Neerja
programme.desc: The story of the courageous Neerja Bhanot, who sacrificed her life while protecting the lives of 359 passengers on a flight in 1986. The flight was hijacked by a terrorist organisation.

programme.title: C Kkompany
programme.desc: An attempt to extort money changes the lives of three financially strapped friends in a Mumbai apartment complex.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: When Bollywood guests make themselves comfortable on Karan Johar's couch, what brews between them is not 'Koffee' but a no-holds-barred conversation. Apart from the juiciest gossip and candid stories, a lot more comes out from under their hats.

programme.title: The Front Row with Anupama Chopra
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: The Train
programme.desc: Vishal Dixit's marriage is slowly disintegrating, and when he encounters a woman on a train, they begin a secret affair, but while in a hotel room, they are taken hostage by a man who could ruin both of their lives for good.

programme.title: Swarg
programme.desc: A man has a clash of wits with another, who successfully schemes with his two brothers to take over the business empire, leaving him penniless.

programme.title: Nautanki Saala!
programme.desc: Ram, a successful theatre artist, saves Mandar from committing suicide. He then ends up developing a special bond with Mandar and even helps solve his problems.

programme.title: Shaadi Ke Side Effects
programme.desc: Two newlyweds adjust to married life and to each other.

programme.title: Darbar
programme.desc: A police officer goes on a chase to hunt down a long-dreaded gangster for fulfilling his own secret agenda.

programme.title: Tanhaji: The Unsung Warrior
programme.desc: Chhatrapati Shivaji's right-hand man Subhedar Tanhaji, known for his valour, gives his all to uphold the dignity of the Marathas in a crucial battle against Mughal chieftain Udaybhan Singh Rathore.

programme.title: Kaabil
programme.desc: Rohan was a kind, happy, young man until he was struck by a terrible tragedy. Now driven by the fire of vengeance, nothing will stop him, not even the fact that he has been blind since birth.

programme.title: Chal Chala Chal
programme.desc: It is a roller-coaster bus ride where mishaps are more than the bus commuters. Corruption chases Deepak but his faith in his principles and his father's love give him strength.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: When Bollywood guests make themselves comfortable on Karan Johar's couch, what brews between them is not 'Koffee' but a no-holds-barred conversation. Apart from the juiciest gossip and candid stories, a lot more comes out from under their hats.

programme.title: Bal Ganesh And The Pomozom Planet
programme.desc: The story behind Lord Ganesh's voracious appetite which recalls the incident of Lord Kubera inviting Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvathi for a feast and the consequential events.

programme.title: Tera Jadoo Chal Gaya
programme.desc: While a popular artist Kabir falls for Pooja during their brief encounter in Agra, she falls in love with her boss's son Raj. She pretends to be engaged to Kabir to avoid getting fired. Unaware of her motive, Kabir is happy about it.

programme.title: Vachan
programme.desc: A man's loss of eyesight leads to him losing his job. This is not the only ramification of the trauma.

programme.title: Dear Dad
programme.desc: A teenager and his father form a special bond with each other while on an unplanned road trip from their home in Delhi to the former's boarding school in Mussoorie.

programme.title: Angrezi Medium
programme.desc: An unassuming mithai shop owner and single father is set to fulfil his daughter's dream to study in London. However, certain misadventures lead him and his family on a new quest, which renews their relationships and bonds.

programme.title: Super 30
programme.desc: Brilliant mathematician Anand Kumar helps 30 smart but underprivileged students prepare for entrance exams for the Indian Institutes of Technology.

programme.title: Mardaani 2
programme.desc: Shivani Shivaji Roy locks horns with the devil incarnate, a young and remorseless serial killer who is raping and murdering young women.

programme.title: Aiyaary
programme.desc: After an army mentor and his protege have a fallout, the protege goes rogue and threatens to bring down the government. The mentor is forced to go after him.

programme.title: Chor Ke Ghar Chor
programme.desc: When an idol of Devi Maa, which brings immense luck to its owner, is found after many years, it causes a lot of mayhem between two noble families that wish to keep it for themselves.

programme.title: The Front Row with Anupama Chopra
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Bhaag Johnny
programme.desc: Bhaag Johnny is the story of a man who is forced to live two lives, and when he has to make a choice a series of unexpected incidents unfolds.

programme.title: Road to Sangam
programme.desc: Hasmat, a devout Muslim, is asked to repair a vehicle that transported the ashes of Mahatma Gandhi. However, the situation soon complicates when his community is shaken by violence.

programme.title: Teen Thay Bhai
programme.desc: In order to inherit a mansion, three squabbling brothers must fulfil their late grandfather's wishes.

programme.title: Traffic
programme.desc: In Pune, Riya needs an urgent heart transplant. Elsewhere in Mumbai, Rehan loses his life. His parents agree to donate his heart to her. It is only by road that they can transport the organ.

programme.title: Why Cheat India
programme.desc: Focuses on existing malpractices in country's education system, the whole concept of buying your way through education, jobs and earnings.

programme.title: De De Pyaar De
programme.desc: A 50-year-old single father faces disapproval from his family and his ex-wife when he falls in love with a 26-year-old woman.

programme.title: The Dirty Picture
programme.desc: A girl runs away from her village hoping to become a movie star but struggles with life in the murky male-dominated world of cinema.

programme.title: Hum
programme.desc: A wealthy and cruel businessman and lord over a dockyard is making slaves out of all his workers. Three brothers with a troubled past decides to fight against his injustice.

programme.title: Contract
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal death of his family, an embittered ex-army officer agrees to infiltrate a gang of terrorists.

programme.title: The Front Row with Anupama Chopra
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Brothers Sameer and Sagar are forced to search for a sunken treasure after a criminal kidnaps Sagar's girlfriend. With three men after the lost treasure, only one can take it all.

programme.title: Rehna Hai Tere Dil Mein
programme.desc: Cupid strikes Maddy when he meets the beautiful Reena. To win her, he assumes the identity of Rajiv, whom she is supposed to marry.

programme.title: Vroom
programme.desc: Vroom, is the story of Smarty, a naughty car with a mind of its own. Smarty starts playing tricks on his new owner and the people around him.

programme.title: Seeta Aur Geeta
programme.desc: Seeta is a wealthy but timid girl who is exploited by her family members, while Geeta is just he opposite.

programme.title: Dil Bechara
programme.desc: Kizie and Manny are poles apart in personality and their battle against cancer is the only common thread binding them. Love slowly wraps them in its embrace, but little do they know what fate has in store for them.

programme.title: Luka Chuppi
programme.desc: A television reporter and a politician's headstrong daughter decide to try out a live-in relationship during a 20-day business trip, but things get complicated when the whole traditional family joins in.

programme.title: Kyaa Super Kool Hain Hum
programme.desc: Two roommates must find a girl and retrieve something valuable from her custody.

programme.title: Made in China
programme.desc: An inventor travels to Shanghai to manufacture a humorous domestic hygiene product.

programme.title: MLA
programme.desc: Kalyan, a simpleton, falls in love with Indu, who is a businessman's daughter. To prove his love for her, he must become an MLA and only if he succeeds, he gets to marry her.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: When Bollywood guests make themselves comfortable on Karan Johar's couch, what brews between them is not 'Koffee' but a no-holds-barred conversation. Apart from the juiciest gossip and candid stories, a lot more comes out from under their hats.

programme.title: The Front Row with Anupama Chopra
programme.desc: Anupama Chopra, a renowned author and film critic, gives her take on the week's latest releases and interviews some of the biggest names in the industry.

programme.title: Kris Aur Krishna
programme.desc: For a chip designed by his father, goons kidnap Kris. His grandmother prays to Lord Krishna for help, who comes disguised as a young boy, Kris.

programme.title: Nauker
programme.desc: Amar, a widower, goes to meet a girl, disguising as his servant. But instead of that girl, he falls in love with Geeta, her maid. Meanwhile, the girl's mother starts getting suspicious about Amar.

programme.title: Sailaab
programme.desc: Krishna has lost his memory but gains love for Dr Sushma, the lady treating him. Soon after the couple get married a policeman phones Sushma and is warned that her husband is out to kill her.

programme.title: Highway
programme.desc: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

programme.title: Tennis Buddies
programme.desc: A young tennis player gets trained by her father who used to play the game too. Problems arise when they do not agree with each other's ideologies of playing single as against playing as a team.

programme.title: Panga
programme.desc: Panga is inspired from the life of a national level Kabbadi player from India. It follows her triumphs, struggle and overcoming of stereotypes and reflecting upon the importance of love and family support in order to become successful.

programme.title: Chhapaak
programme.desc: A young woman tries to rebuild her life after a man throws acid in her face on a public street in New Delhi in 2005.

programme.title: Pink
programme.desc: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

programme.title: Nagina
programme.desc: Rajiv's wealthy mother wants him to marry the daughter of Thakur Ajay Singh, Vijaya, for her beauty. Rajiv, however, is in love with an orphan named Rajni. Rajni wins Rajiv's mother over and they are allowed to marry. All goes well until a snake charmer, Bhairo Nnath, arrives on the scene and tells the mother that her daughter-in-law is a reptilian shape-shifter with evil intentions. Bhairo Nnath knows more than he is telling.

programme.title: Bal Ganesh And The Pomozom Planet
programme.desc: The story behind Lord Ganesh's voracious appetite which recalls the incident of Lord Kubera inviting Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvathi for a feast and the consequential events.

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: When Bollywood guests make themselves comfortable on Karan Johar's couch, what brews between them is not 'Koffee' but a no-holds-barred conversation. Apart from the juiciest gossip and candid stories, a lot more comes out from under their hats.

programme.title: Miss 420
programme.desc: After an agent is assassinated, an investigative reporter discovers some evidence that points to gangster Diwan Kapoor. However, the reporter is kidnapped. Watch the drama unfolds?

programme.title: Pyar Mein Kabhi Kabhi
programme.desc: This is a story of Sid, Khushi and Bugs, who dream to make it big in the entertainment business. Watch this love story starring Dino Morea, Rinkie Khanna and Sanjay Suri in their debut.

programme.title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
programme.desc: A charitable, happy-go-lucky man embarks on a mission to meet a generous princess who helps people, so he takes the place of a prince.

programme.title: Sarkar Raj
programme.desc: When Anita Raja, CEO of Sheppard power plant, brings a power plant proposal to set up in rural Mahrashtra before the Nagres, insightful Shankar is quick to realise the benefits the power plant can bring to the people.

programme.title: Dhruva
programme.desc: A committed police officer is on a very dangerous mission to destroy the most corrupt person in the country, Siddharth Abhimanyu.

programme.title: Maqbool
programme.desc: Maqbool is the loyal man of Jahangir Khan, a powerful underworld don. But Maqbool is in love with Nimmi, Jahangir's mistress, who convinces him to be ambitious and take over the empire.
